text: 1.4.8 Livestock zones in Australia Dr Stuart Barber srbarber@unimelb.edu.au VETS30030 / VETS90123 Livestock “zones” Rainfall and temperature Generic zones May vary over time Changes in crop/pasture can move boundary https://www.abc.net.au/news/2017-03-11/old-maps-australia-art-cartography/8314730?nw=0 Beef cattle distribution https://www.agriculture.gov.au/agriculture- land/animal/health/livestock-movement- australia/livestock_movement_summary#snapshot-4-structure-and- dynamics-of-australias-beef-industry Dairy https://www.agriculture.gov.au/animal/health/livestock-movement-australia/livestock_movement_summary#snapshot-5-structure-and-dynamics-of-australias-dairy-industry Feral goats https://www.environment.gov.au/system/files/resources/9678 76f3-8b2b-4692-ac87-3a6c8b946389/files/acris-goats- report.pdf
